example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اوضح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تنظيم) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاستفتاء)))) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يخضع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سلطة) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المنظمات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجتماعية) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكوبية)) (CONJ لا) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولة))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: To the authority of Cuban social organizations
